254394.「やる気 出ないわー。\n お前の顔を彫るって 約束はしたんだけどー。\n やる:
I'm so unmotivated. I promised to carve your
face. I just can't get motivated.

254395.<cs_pchero>は マカイ・マカロンの箱を\nそっと 差し出した。:
<cs_pchero> gently offered a box of Makai
Macarons.

254397.「スライムのように 愛らしいフォルム！\n 魔界で 唯一無二の ふわサク感！\n:
As adorable as Slime! The one and only fluffiness in Demon World! The sweetness of the cake will make even the Walking Corpse
weep...

254398.「ゼクレス王家も御用達 マカイ・マカロン！\n こいつを ワシに くれるってのか:
Makai Macarons! The royal family of Zechres!
You're giving it to me?

254399.「あ…甘い物とか\n べつに 好きじゃないけど……\n もらっといてやる！:
Oh...I don't like sweets or anything,
but...I'll take it!

254400.モヒペンコは <cs_pchero>から\nマカイ・マカロンを いそいそと 受け:
Mohipenko was eagerly accepting Makai Macarons
from <cs_pchero>.

254402.「フンっ！\n なかなか やるじゃない！: Hmph! You're pretty good at that!

254403.「……仕方ねえなー。\n あんだけ硬い 幻獣のツノも 初めてだったし。\n お前:
I don't know... I can't help it. I've never
seen such a hard Beast's Horn before. I'm
gonna carve your face!

254404.「まあ…… それでも \n ここに並ぶ ４人の大魔王に比べたら\n まだまだ ひ:
Well... even so, I'm still a novice compared
to the four Great Demon Kings lined up here!

254405.「特に ネロドスなんか 本当にいい男だったぜ。\n １０００年前に 死んじまった:
Especially Nerodos, who died a thousand years
ago. You're not even close to Nerodos.

254407.「この 大ウソつきめ！\n ちょっとばかし強いからって お前ごときが\n 不死の:
You big liar! How can you win against the
Immortal Demon King Nerodos just because
you're a little stronger than him!

254408.「ネロドスの顔を彫ったのは ワシだ。 \n そして ワシは 自分の作品から その:
It was I who carved Nerodos' face. And I can
create visions of the model's past from my
work!

254409.「こいつは 本物の ネロドスとちがって \n 不死のチカラこそないが 本物なみに:
Unlike the real Nerodos, this one does not
have immortality, but it is as strong as the
real thing.

254410.「お前が ネロドスに勝てるほど\n 強いというなら 証明してみせろ！\n そうす:
If you're strong enough to beat Nerodos, prove
it! Then I'll carve your face on it!
